attributes.action: immediately hold a free vote in the House of Commons for the dissolution of parliament. In light of the current and ongoing national crisis involving all party corruption, we the undersigned demand our constitutional right to petition for a free vote on dissolution. We have no confidence in the integrity of all parliamentarians currently sitting in the House. Confidence can only be restored by a free vote on dissolution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a constitutional crisis that can only be resolved by the ballot box.
We demand a free vote for the dissolution of parliament.

rejection.details: Voting in Parliament is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
